name: Elf Baldi's Basics in Christmas and presents
name_original: Elf Baldi's Basics in Christmas and presents
description:
This is a Christmas mod for Baldi's basics in education and learning 1.4.3. Everything in  a  Christmas styled where instead of notebooks  you have to get presents and all the trees are Christmas trees. And to let you know I will not make an Android version of this.

Story:

It is Christmas Eve and you and your fellow elfs are getting all the presents ready for the little boys and girls until Principal Claus realizes he forgot a few of his in his presents in the workshop so you have to go in the Workshop and get all 7 of the presents. But be careful Elf Baldi and the other elfs will be in the way including Principal Claus and Elf Boss. After when you get all 7 presents you need to leave the workshop and then head to Principal Claus office and then you take off and win the game. 

Warning some voices might be bad.
